p:
The activity of catalase was measured according to the reported method.
52 The reaction mixture consisted of 2.9 mL of 10 mM H 2O 2 in 50 mM potassium phosphate buffer (pH 7) and 0.1 mL of the supernatant or serum. The rate of decrease in the absorbance was recorded at 240 nm for 3 min. The results were expressed as Î¼mol/mg of the protein.
